text: Petit-Val is a new municipality of the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2015, the former municipalities of Ch√¢telat, Monible, Sornetan and Souboz merged into the new municipality of Petit-Val. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the municipality of Petit-Val Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois Category:2015 establishments in Switzerland
title: Petit-Val
